Treatment Options for Gastrointestinal Carcinoid Tumors
		            
		                
		                    Carcinoid Tumors in the Stomach
		                    Treatment of gastrointestinal (GI) carcinoid tumors in the stomach may include the following:         -  Endoscopic surgery (resection) for small tumors.    - Surgery (resection) to remove part or all of the stomach.
